CustomField.formula: IF(NOT( ISPICKVAL(Liability_Certification__c,"")) && ISPICKVAL(Liability_Certification__c,"Yes")&& NOT( ISPICKVAL(Debarment_Certification__c,"")) && ISPICKVAL(Debarment_Certification__c,"Yes")&& NOT( ISPICKVAL(CSLB_Certification__c,"")) && ISPICKVAL(CSLB_Certification__c,"Yes")&& NOT( ISPICKVAL(Ready_to_Submit__c,"")) && ISPICKVAL(Ready_to_Submit__c,"Yes")&& ISNULL(VIP_Date_Time_Submitted__c),true,false) || IF(HonestContractor__c = true,true,false)
CustomField.label: PW Ready to Submit
